name: Exorcism: Case Zero
description: The year is 1998. Taking the role as Father Thomas Gates, you have been assigned to perform an exorcism ritual to a woman named Mary Kennedy, which was reported to have been possessed by evil spirit.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-7167U  @2.80 GHz, equivalent or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: CPU integrated graphics / dedicated graphics card with 1 GB VRAM Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: ©2017 Paul C. K. W All Rights Reserved.
